page.title: 19THE MILKMAN.
page.content: My dad delivers milk to people in this area. He also delivers eggs and pop, bread and cartons of orange. He delivers these on a Wednesday in the little van. He delivers milk in the big van. He collects the money on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays. He delivers milk,early in the morning, every day except Sunday. He has four milk boys to help him with the milk round. A man called Lester delivers all the milk to the little dairy and my dad picks it up to take to all the people's houses. He looks at the note that people have put in the milk bottles. They say whether they want extra milk or no milk delivered. Sometimes my dad goes to bed in the afternoon for a couple of hours. Sometimes he has to make up the books so he knows how much people owe. My mam helps him to do the books.
